name: RPG Clicker (itch) (Lionstar Games)
description:
An RPG clicker game that includes enemies, bosses and loot. Collect loot to be able to do more damage to your enemies. There are 7 rarities of loot:

  • Common
  • Uncommon
  • Rare
  • Epic
  • Legendary
  • Mythic
  • Special

All loot is obtained by killing a boss which occurs every 100 enemies and all loot rewarded to the player is completely random (Will have random chance spawns in the future).

This RPG clicker is completely endless; no player level cap, no enemy cap and no coin cap.

This game is currently in development and will be improved with fixes and new additions in every update. Make sure to check through the devlogs below to find out what's new or what is coming soon in a future patch.

If you have any suggestions, improvements or report bug fixes, leave your comments in posts below.
